languages.text:
Вы запустили торпеды. Торпеды действуют со следующего хода в порядке своей {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}очередности{/g} — в ход торпед вы сможете направлять их.
Ваши торпеды могут пролетать через пространство вашего корабля, не нанеся ему урона. Как только торпеды достигнут соседней клетки любого противника, они взорвутся.

You have fired a {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}torpedo salvo{/g}. Torpedoes will appear next turn in the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} order — once their turn begins, you will be able to direct them.
Your own torpedoes can pass through the space occupied by your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} without damaging it. As soon as torpedoes reach a cell adjacent to any enemy, they explode.
languages.original_text:
Вы запустили торпеды. Торпеды действуют со следующего хода в порядке своей {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}очередности{/g} — в ход торпед вы сможете направлять их.
Ваши торпеды могут пролетать через пространство вашего корабля, не нанеся ему урона. Как только торпеды достигнут соседней клетки любого противника, они взорвутся.

traits.locale_text:
You have fired a torpedo salvo. Torpedoes start acting on their own next turn in the initiative order — once their turn begins, you will be able to direct them.
Your own torpedoes can pass through the space occupied by your flagship without damaging it. As soon as torpedoes reach a cell adjacent to any enemy, they explode.

You have fired a torpedo salvo. Torpedoes start acting on their own next turn in the initiative order — once their turn begins, you will be able to direct them.
Your own torpedoes can pass through the space occupied by your flagship without damaging it. As soon as torpedoes reach a cell adjacent to any enemy, they explode.

You have fired a {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}torpedo salvo{/g}. Torpedoes will appear next turn in the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} order — once their turn begins, you will be able to direct them.
Your own torpedoes can pass through the space occupied by your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} without damaging it. As soon as torpedoes reach a cell adjacent to any enemy, they explode.

You have fired a {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}torpedo salvo{/g}. Torpedoes will appear next turn in the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} order — once their turn begins, you will be able to direct them.
Your own torpedoes can pass through the space occupied by your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} without damaging it. As soon as torpedoes reach a cell adjacent to any enemy, they explode.

You have fired a {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}torpedo salvo{/g}. Torpedoes will appear next turn in the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} order — once their turn begins, you will be able to direct them.
Your own torpedoes can pass through the space occupied by your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} without damaging it. As soon as torpedoes reach a cell adjacent to any enemy, they explode.

You have fired a {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}torpedo salvo{/g}. Torpedoes will appear next turn in the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} order — once their turn begins, you will be able to direct them.
Your own torpedoes can pass through the space occupied by your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} without damaging it. As soon as torpedoes reach a cell adjacent to any enemy, they explode.

languages.text:
Has disparado una {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}salva de torpedos{/g}. Los torpedos aparecerán el siguiente turno en el orden de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}prioridad{/g}. Al empezar su turno, podrás controlarlos.
Tus torpedos pueden atravesar el espacio ocupado por tu {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} sin dañarla. En cuanto los torpedos alcancen una casilla adyacente a cualquier enemigo, explotarán.
languages.original_text:
You have fired a {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}torpedo salvo{/g}. Torpedoes will appear next turn in the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} order — once their turn begins, you will be able to direct them.
Your own torpedoes can pass through the space occupied by your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} without damaging it. As soon as torpedoes reach a cell adjacent to any enemy, they explode.

traits.locale_text:
Has disparado una {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}salva de torpedos{/g}. Los torpedos aparecerán el siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} en el orden de iniciativa. Al empezar su turno, podrás controlarlos.
Tus torpedos pueden atravesar el espacio ocupado por tu {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} sin dañarla. En cuanto los torpedos alcancen una casilla adyacente a cualquier enemigo, explotarán.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}魚雷を斉射{/g}した。魚雷は{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}優先度{/g}順に、次のターンに表示される。魚雷のターンが始まると、魚雷を指示できるようになる。
味方の魚雷は、{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}にダメージを与えることなく、旗艦の空間を通過することができる。魚雷は敵に隣接するセルに到達するとすぐに爆発する。
languages.original_text:
You have fired a {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}torpedo salvo{/g}. Torpedoes will appear next turn in the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} order — once their turn begins, you will be able to direct them.
Your own torpedoes can pass through the space occupied by your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} without damaging it. As soon as torpedoes reach a cell adjacent to any enemy, they explode.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}魚雷を斉射{/g}した。魚雷はイニシアチブ順序で次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}に表示される。魚雷のターンが始まると、魚雷を指示できるようになる。
自分の魚雷は、{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}にダメージを与えることなく、旗艦の空間を通過することができる。魚雷は敵に隣接するセルに到達するとすぐに爆発する。

languages.text:
您发射了一组{g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}鱼雷集群{/g}。鱼雷会在下个回合时按照{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}先攻{/g}值出现在战场上。当鱼雷的回合开始时，您可以指挥鱼雷前进。
您自己的鱼雷可以穿过您的{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}占据的区域，不会对您的旗舰造成损害。当您的鱼雷抵达敌方舰船相邻区域时，便会爆炸。
languages.original_text:
You have fired a {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}torpedo salvo{/g}. Torpedoes will appear next turn in the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} order — once their turn begins, you will be able to direct them.
Your own torpedoes can pass through the space occupied by your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} without damaging it. As soon as torpedoes reach a cell adjacent to any enemy, they explode.

traits.locale_text:
您发射了一组{g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}鱼雷集群{/g}。鱼雷会在下个回合时按照{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}先攻{/g}值出现在战场上。当鱼雷的回合开始时，您可以指挥鱼雷前进。
您自己的鱼雷可以穿过您的{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}占据的区域，不会对您的旗舰造成损害。当您的鱼雷抵达敌方舰船相邻区域时，便会爆炸。

languages.text:
Du hast eine {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}Torpedosalve{/g} abgefeuert. Torpedos erscheinen im nächsten Zug in der Reihenfolge der {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}Priorität{/g} – sobald ihr Zug beginnt, kannst du sie lenken.
Deine eigenen Torpedos können den von deinem {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiff{/g} besetzten Raum durchqueren, ohne es zu beschädigen. Sobald Torpedos ein Feld erreichen, das an einen Feind angrenzt, explodieren sie.
languages.original_text:
You have fired a {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}torpedo salvo{/g}. Torpedoes will appear next turn in the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} order — once their turn begins, you will be able to direct them.
Your own torpedoes can pass through the space occupied by your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} without damaging it. As soon as torpedoes reach a cell adjacent to any enemy, they explode.

traits.locale_text:
Du hast eine {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}Torpedosalve{/g} abgefeuert. Torpedos erscheinen in der nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} in der Reihenfolge der Initiative – sobald ihre Runde beginnt, kannst du sie lenken.
Deine eigenen Torpedos können den von deinem {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiff{/g} besetzten Raum durchqueren, ohne es zu beschädigen. Sobald Torpedos ein Feld erreichen, das an einen Gegner angrenzt, explodieren sie.

languages.text:
Vous avez tiré une {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}salve de torpilles{/g}. Les torpilles apparaîtront au prochain tour dans l'ordre de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priorité{/g}. Une fois ce tour commencé, vous pourrez les diriger.
Vos torpilles peuvent traverser l'espace occupé par votre {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} sans l'endommager. Dès que les torpilles atteignent une case adjacente à un ennemi, elles explosent.
languages.original_text:
You have fired a {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}torpedo salvo{/g}. Torpedoes will appear next turn in the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} order — once their turn begins, you will be able to direct them.
Your own torpedoes can pass through the space occupied by your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} without damaging it. As soon as torpedoes reach a cell adjacent to any enemy, they explode.

traits.locale_text:
Vous avez tiré une {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}salve de torpilles{/g}. Les torpilles apparaîtront au prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} dans l'ordre d'initiative. Une fois ce tour commencé, vous pourrez les diriger.
Vos torpilles peuvent traverser l'espace occupé par votre {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} sans l'endommager. Dès que les torpilles atteignent une case adjacente à un ennemi, elles explosent.

languages.text:
Bir {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}torpido salvosu{/g} ateşledin. Torpidolar bir sonraki turda {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}öncelik{/g} sırasında görünür hâle gelecek. Turları başladığında onları yönlendirebileceksin.
Kendi torpidoların {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}sancak geminin{/g} kapladığı alandan gemine zarar vermeden geçebilir. Torpidolar herhangi bir düşmana bitişik bir hücreye ulaşır ulaşmaz patlar.
languages.original_text:
You have fired a {g|Encyclopedia:TorpedoSalvoSpace}torpedo salvo{/g}. Torpedoes will appear next turn in the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} order — once their turn begins, you will be able to direct them.
Your own torpedoes can pass through the space occupied by your {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} without damaging it. As soon as torpedoes reach a cell adjacent to any enemy, they explode.
